sentiment_bias.assessment: Sources skew bullish (3.6:1 ratio). Most analyst coverage is positive with 'strong buy' recommendations. Bear cases exist but are underrepresented.
sentiment_bias.mitigation: Included detailed risk analysis and competitive threats section to balance perspective

source_concentration_bias.assessment: Good source diversity. No single source dominates the data collection.

recency_bias.assessment: Most data is recent (Q3 FY2026). Historical context is limited but appropriate for current analysis.
recency_bias.mitigation: Included 5-year stock return data and historical valuation ranges

viewpoint_bias.assessment: Limited representation of contrarian views and end-customer perspectives.
viewpoint_bias.mitigation: Explicitly highlighted competition risks and potential market share erosion scenarios

key_biases: Bullish sentiment skew in analyst coverage
mitigations_applied: Explicit acknowledgment of uncertainty in forward estimates
overall_bias_assessment.recommendation: Analysis is usable with awareness of bullish tilt. Investment thesis should weight bear case scenarios appropriately.
